Address.value: 6220 AMERICA CENTER DRIVE,SUITE 100, SAN JOSE, California, 95022, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bill.com Holdings Inc is a provider of cloud-based software which automates complex back-office financial operations for SMBs. Its artificial-intelligence enabled financial software platform used mostly to build connections between customers, suppliers, and clients. The company's platform generates and process invoices, streamline approvals, send and receive payments, sync with their accounting system, and manage their cash. The firm generates revenue through subscription and transaction fees.
